verbose_text: By co-expressing chaperones to increase the amount of soluble CAR protein within the E. coli cells, using the validated pETDuet-1 : EcPPtase : TvCAR expression set-up with the TvCAR as well as using the E. coli BL21 (DE3) strain to facilitate high expression levels and the overreduction of 3,4-dihydroxypheylacetaldehyde 3 b to 3 c, a significant improvement of the synthesis of 3-HT (3 c) was demonstrated.
